text: The Canadian Women's Hockey League (CWHL) was an ice hockey league in Canada that was formed in 2007. Female players from around the world played in this league and in the Western Women's Hockey League. The CWHL replaced the National Women's Hockey League (NWHL) in 2007. Many teams (Toronto, Brampton and Montreal) from the NWHL moved to the CWHL. == Teams in the CWHL == *Boston Blades *Brampton Thunder *Burlington Barracudas *Montreal Stars *Team Alberta CWHL *Toronto Furies == CWHL Champions == *2007-08 - Brampton Thunder *2008-09 - Montreal Stars *2009-10 - Montreal Stars *2010-11 - Montreal Stars == Clarkson Cup == The Clarkson Cup is an ice hockey trophy, which since 2009 has been awarded to the winner of the Canadian Women's Hockey Championship. *2009 - Montreal Stars *2010 - Minnesota Whitecaps (WWHL) *2011 - Montreal Stars == Other websites == * CWHL.ca * Canadian Women's Hockey League on Facebook Category:Ice hockey leagues in Canada
title: Canadian Women's Hockey League
